name: rushbee-wol-agent
description: Minimal Wake-on-LAN relay for RushBee cafes

scripts.build:win: mkdir -p dist-win && pkg . --target node18-win-x64 --compress GZip --output dist-win/rushbee-wol-agent-win.exe && cp launcher.vbs start-wol-agent.bat dist-win/ && cd dist-win && zip -r ../rushbee-wol-agent-win.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p dist-linux && pkg . --target node18-linux-x64 --compress GZip --output dist-linux/rushbee-wol-agent-linux && cd dist-linux && zip -r ../rushbee-wol-agent-linux.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build:macos: mkdir -p dist-macos && pkg . --target node18-macos-x64 --compress GZip --output dist-macos/rushbee-wol-agent-macos && cd dist-macos && zip -r ../rushbee-wol-agent-macos.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build:all: npm run build:win && npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos
